isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Diesel Engine Diagnostic Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Diagnostic Tools and Accessories - Tools and Accessories - Gauge Bar Tool

svcproc.title: Gauge Bar Tool
svcproc.para: The Gauge Bar Tool is used to measure intake manifold (boost) pressure, fuel system inlet restriction, fuel pressure, oil pressure, air cleaner intake restriction, and crankcase pressure.

item.para: 0 kPa to 200 kPa (0 psi to 30 psi) measures intake manifold pressure.
0-30 in Hg vacuum /0 kPa to 200 kPa (0 psi to 30 psi) compound gauge measures fuel system inlet restriction and intake manifold pressure.
0-30 in H 2O 0 kPa to 7.5 kPa (0 psi to 1 psi) maximum pressure magnehelic gauge measures crankcase pressure and air inlet restriction.
60 kPa to 1100 kPa (0 psi to 160 psi) gauge may be used to check the fuel pressure and oil pressure.
